LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning:
Summer has begun! But winter is coming.

Your food crops won't grow in the winter cold. Be sure to store several days' worth of food now, while you still can.

You can build a walk-in refrigeration room to prevent food from spoiling.

And try to buy, steal, or make some parkas, or you'll freeze when you step outside.
